activities: Customer information such as addresses, shipping preferences, special instructions relating to the commercial relationship are received and stored. Credit card information is not stored by Chromatography Research supplies unless explicitly demanded by the customer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer name, address, ordering data, form data, special instruction, email, product specifications. No medical data unless transmitted in casual discussion. No transfers to 3rd parties.
